hero_title: Ufite indoto zo kujya mu mikino ya Olempike?
hero_subtitle: Kora iri suzuma ry'amasegonda 60 urebe niba ufite ibisabwa kugira ngo utsindire umudari wa zahabu, hatitawe ku bushobozi bwawe bw'imikino.
question_1_feedback: Ibivugwa n'abahanga: Niba witonda kandi ukagenzura cyane ufite amahirwe yo guhirwa mu nzego nyinshi z'ubuzima, zirimo n'imikino. Niba utabikora, ni ngombwa gutangira.
question_2_high: Rimwe na rimwe nkoresha umuhate mwishi
question_2_feedback: Ibivugwa n'abahanga: Kwiha intego yo hejuru bishobora gufasha umukinnyi ku rwego rwo hejuru, ariko na none ni ngombwa kutiha intego zirenze ubushobozi bwawe.
question_3_question: Gukomeza cyangwa kunanirwa iyo ibintu bikomeye?
question_3_feedback: Icyo abahanga bavuga: Uhagaze ku murongo ugiye gutangira kwiruka metero 100, abantu babarirwa mu ma miliyoni bari kwitegereza buri ntambwe utera. Ese byakorohera? Ni byiza kwitwara neza iyo uri ku gitutu.
question_4_question: Ese uri icyamamare cyangwa ni ibisanzwe gusa?
question_4_feedback: Icyo abahanga bavuga: N'ubwo wenda atari ikintu cyiza cyane, ariko kwikunda bishobora gufasha abakinnyi kugera kure. Ariko si abakinnyi bose bakora ibyo kandi wibuke ko nta muntu ukunda umuntu wirata.
question_5_question: Uhatana mu marushanwa  cyangwa wikundira ibyoroshye?
question_5_low: Nitabira ayoroshye gusa iyo ari ngombwa
question_5_feedback: Icyo abahanga bavuga: Ntuzashobora kuba umukinnyi wa Olempike niba udashaka guhiganwa n'abahanga ngo ubarushe. Kugira umurava w'amarushanwa bituma ukora neza.
question_6_question: Ujya utegura ibirori cyangwa utegereza guhabwa ubutumire?
question_6_med: Rimwe na rimwe biterwa n'uko bimeze
question_6_feedback: Icyo abahanga bavuga: Ibintu byiza buri gihe ntibiza ku bantu bategereza. Koresha amahirwe ukiyafite niba ushaka gutsinda.
question_7_question: Ukora ikintu kubera urukundo rw'umukino cyangwa indonke ubona?
question_7_lowest: Indonke gusa ni yo intera imbaraga
question_7_low: Indonke ni cyo kintu cy'ingenzi kintera imbaraga
question_7_high: Navuga ko mbyishimira, kuruta kuba nabikunda
question_7_feedback: Icyo abahanga bavuga: Uterwa imbaraga gute? Ibi buri gihe biba biri ku byapa bitanga akazi, bihari kubera impamvu-Guterwa umuhate cyane ni kimwe mu bintu byatuma ugera ku ntsinzi.
question_8_feedback: Icyo abahanga bavuga: Uwo muhanganye wa mbere ni indorerwamu. Niba ushishikajwe no kwivugurura mu mikinire yawe, amahirwe ni menshi ko ubigeraho.
question_9_feedback: Icyo abahanga bavuga: Kwigirira icyizere ni ngombwa mu gutsinda mu mikino---Uzabaze Usain Bolt. Ariko ibi bishobora guhinduka ndetse na Usain ajya agira ibihe bimugora mu cyizere cye.
question_10_feedback: Icyo abahanga bavuga: Uracyari kumwe natwe? Waba wageze ku ntego utarangaye? Ubwonko bushobora kwita ku bintu bicye icyarimwe. Ubwo rero kwita ku cy'ingenzi cyane ni ngombwa.
question_11_lowest: Buri gihe nshakisha ubufasha iyo mbukeneye.
question_11_feedback: Icyo abahanga bavuga: Nta muntu wigira wenyine. Ukeneye ubufasha? Busabe bagenzi bawe, umuryango, inshuti, abo mukinana, umutoza- bose bashobora kukongerera imbaraga.
question_12_question: Ugendera ku ntego cyangwa utegereza ikibaye?
question_12_feedback: Icyo abahanga bavuga: Uko ugera ku ntego zawe, wigirira icyizere mu bushobozi bwawe, maze mu kanya nk'ako guhumbya, ukagera ku birenze ibyo warotaga.
question_14_question: Ukora imyitozo y'umubiri ku ruhe rugero?
results_category_1_text: Ufite ibikenewe kugira ngo ugere ku rwego rwo hejuru mu marushanwa akomeye y'imikino. Harabura imyaka ine gusa mbere y'imikino itaha ya Olempike. Tangira witoze!
results_category_2_text: Ufite ibikenewe no kuba uhagaze neza mu mutwe ariko ushobora kunanirwa guhangara Usain Bolt na bagenzi be kugira ngo ugere ku rwego rw'imidari.
results_category_3_text: Birasa n'aho udafite imbaraga zikenewe z'umukinnyi wa Olempike, ariko ushobora kuba umuntu w'ingenzi mu mukino mu kipe ukinamo. Shyiramo umuhate niba ushaka kugera ku rundi rwego.
results_category_4_text: Ntufite imbaraga zikenewe mu mikino ya Olempike ariko ushobora gukomeza kunezezwa n'imikino ndetse no kwidagadura. Cyaba ari igihe cyo kwiruka?
results_category_5_text: Bishobora kugaragara nk'ibigutunguye ku kuba usa n'udafite imbaraga zisabwa ku mukinnyi wa Olempike ariko ushobora gukomeza kuryoherwa n'imyitozo nk'uburyo bwo gukomeza kwitoza.
activity_1_text: Reba ibirambuye ku buryo wagira uruhare mu mikino ku rubuga
activity_2_text: Reba andi makuru y'uburyo watangira imyitozo mu mikino ku rubuga
share_text_example: Mfite imbaraga z'{insert result}. Reba niba wowe
share_result_4: Mfite imbaraga z'umuntu wiruka mu mpera z'icyumweru gusa
share_outro_text: Reba niba ufite ibikenewe mu kurushanwa i #Rio2016
credits_external_sites_message: BBC ntirebwa n'ibindi wasoma ku zindi mbuga
legacy_ie_message: Wagombye guhindura uburyo butuma winjira muri interineti
method_text: Iri suzuma ryatunganyijwe ku bufatanye na Dr David Fletcher, umuhanga mu bumenyi bw'imiterere y'abantu mu mikino muri Kaminuza ya Loughborough. Ibibazo byateguwe mu rwego rwo kugaragaza ibintu bikenewe kugira ngo ugere ku rwego rwo hejuru rw'amarushanwa mu mikino.
